doc.title: Global Warning: The Thaw of War
doc.plot: Rising temperatures melt glaciers worldwide. But in a remote corner of the Alps they spit out mummified soldiers and live explosives of World War One. It's "Global Warming meets War" I hear an excited film executive say. Fact is they are both lethal and both triggered by Industrial Rivalries. So the current rivalry melts out the old one? And can we stop this vicious circle? Attempting to answer these questions sparks the quest of GLOBAL WARNING - THE THAW OF WAR.
